content: 66 93 yds / 40 60 85 m fingering weight yarn i used turtlepurl yarns striped turtle toes for my sample pumpkin ***needles *** us1 2 25 mm circular needles double-pointed needles or mini-circulars whichever is your preference for working small circumferences ***notions *** tapestry needle stitch marker ***additional materials *** twigs or cinnamon sticks for the pumpkin stalk glue gun toy stuffing or polyfill to fill the pumpkin if you don t have any on hand stuff that pumpkin with some scrap yarn ribbon or yarn i made a simple 2-stitch i-cord for mine for the pumpkin curls optional **gauge** 34 stitches by 40 rounds = 4 / 10 cm in ribbing motif after blocking ___ **rhyflower community** join the rhyflower knits makers facebook group 2 to share your wips & fos with other rhyflower knitters 1 https //rhyflowerknits com/newsletter/ 2 https //www facebook com/groups/rhyflowerknits/
